title: Diego Costa
summary: Diego da Silva Costa (Spanish: [ˈdjeɣo ða ˈsilβa ˈkosta], Portuguese: [ˈdʒjeɡu dɐ ˈsiwvɐ ˈkɔstɐ]; born 7 October 1988),[4][5] commonly known as Diego Costa, is a professional footballer who plays as a striker for Brasileirão club Atlético Mineiro and the Spain national team.
